item.title: S3 19. Chi-town Shenanigans! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description We linked back up w/ Chouib who was in the audience at the Chicago show! Recapped our time there and learned more from the Chi-town native! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 18. Voice over acting in the U.S.! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Erica, who was the voice of Pearl the octopus on Finding Nemo teaches Naomi tongue twisters and tips on becoming a voice actor in the U.S. Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 17. Hope in online dating? | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description John from Florida tells us how he found his love online! Is there hope in online dating? We need more Johns! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description Naomi Takes America went on tour this summer! Here are snippets from the Miami & D.C. shows! Learning Spanglish from the audience, giving relationship advice, and more! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 13. Naomi Takes America The Podcast LIVE! Snippets from NYC & ATL | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Naomi Takes America went on tour this summer! For those of you who couldn't make it and for those who want to listen again, here are snippets from the New York and Atlanta shows! We loved meeting the fans in person! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 12. Period! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description @nadyaokamoto aka the Period Fairy talks about her period care brand August, the social shame and stigma of menstruation, and all things PERIOD! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 11. Welcome to NEW YORK! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Tiff the dating coach and NYC's cupid and Naomi meet up for a conversation about finding looooove and sex. Listen in to hear Naomi's *special* "welcome to New York" experience. Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 10. Counseling Culture in America! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Marie, who was a school counselor at an international school in Japan talks about counseling, which isn't too common in Japan. Naomi gets some great counseling and advice! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 9. Arizona is HAAWT! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Dominel has one thing to teach Naomi about America - that Arizona is blazin hawwwt! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 8. The Power of Music! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Music director and trumpet player Igmar comes on the show to talk about his experiences on stage with all of Naomi's favorite artists. Is there Naomi and Igmar's comedy x music collab in the future? Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 7. I Love Naked Dancing! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Chase, a dancer/actor living in NY tells us his experiences of growing up in the American show biz! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 6. What's up your butt? | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Liz from Tampa tells us about all the crazy things that happen working at an emergency room at the hospital - including things found up the you-know-what! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 5. Holidays, Family and Pink's | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Kwame from L.A. comes on the show to tell us about how he spends holidays with his interesting family! Naomi also talks about her family and one of her favorite places to go to in L.A. Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 4. Ride Low and Slow - L.A. Style | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Darin from L.A. gives Naomi a history lesson on Japanese Americans in L.A. and discuss the differences in L.A. and New York culture! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 3. Do you wanna come? | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Terry, a New York based stand up comedian tells Naomi about the local comedy scene. Will you come see Naomi do stand up? Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 2. Pre-gaming and Losing Teeth | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Claire from Texas tells us about her fun American college life in Texas and teaches Naomi about pre-gaming and waking up with teeth lost - Hangover style! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠⁠Fill out this form⁠⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S3 1. Season Kick Off: Sexy Time English Lesson | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description We're back for the third season of Naomi Takes America! We have a new assistant, Rei for this season and in this episode we welcome Aly, an English teacher YouTuber and we have fun with some sexy time English! Do you want to be on the show? ⁠Fill out this form⁠ and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 24. One Year of Taking America | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description I've learned so much over the last year of doing this podcast! Today, I talk about some of my favorite things I've learned about America. I fucking love it here! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 23. New York vs. New Jersey! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Brianna! She is from New Jersey and taught me about the Garden State! I hear NJ drivers are crazy... but I should get myself to a diner! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 22. Sex, Love and U-Haul Lesbians | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today’s guests are Alex and Kenya! They are fellow podcasters and taught me a lot! We started off talking about walking cats on leashes… but of course we ended up talking about our love lives. Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 21. Orgasm Comedy | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description I've been traveling so much this year! But I'm finally back for a month in New York and excited to sleep. Instead of having a guest today, Sheena and I talk about my comedy and fashion dreams. One day I hope I can get on SNL! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 20. Pop Music ABCs | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Sophia! She's a singer living in LA. We talk about the music world and how she's blending her Japanese and American cultures together in her songs. She's so cool and her music made me so happy! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 19. You Betcha! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Tiana! She is from the Midwest and taught me a lot about what life is like there - including cute new slang phrases! Do I need to visit the Midwest? Ooftah, you betcha! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 18. The Return of MC "Always Wet" Naomi | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Tony! He is a rapper from LA living in Japan. We rap together and he taught me how stand up comedy is a lot like rapping. Maybe I'll start doing both with my MC name, Always Wet Naomi - what do you think? Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 17. NYC Roommates with Tails | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today, my friend Kei is on my podcast! He's going to be my podcast partner for the next two weeks. He's a native New Yorker and taught me a lot about New York. Apparently leaving M&Ms out is an invitation for new roommates with tails? Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 16. Very Puberty | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guests are Joey and Misaki! They taught me about how Americans learn about sex from their parents and how different sex education is here. Mom, please don't listen to this one! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 15. #TWINNING in the US and Japan! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guests are Derrick and Desmond! They're twins and told me about their experience as twins in the US and in Japan. They also taught me about American comedy and how to pick up men in New York. I'm going to try out their tips! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 14. Naomi Starts a Cult...? | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Darlene! She teaches me about fitness culture in America... and also to be careful of cults?! I didn't know I had to worry about cults when I go to the gym! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 13. Otaku in America | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Mel! She teaches me about public high schools and we talk about otaku culture in America. If you're an otaku, come join me on the show - I want to learn more about American otakus! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 12. Let's go to Target! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Katrina! She teaches me about how to make friends in America through dodgeball and about her favorite store. I can't wait to try both! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 11. Back in New York! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description I'm finally back in New York after performing in the musical Hairspray in Japan last year. Listen in for my 2022 end of year events (featuring Mr. Brad Pitt). It's the kick off episode for 2023! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 10. It's Libra Season! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Ryan! We talk about some of my favorite American topics - from LA and NY rivalry to American breakfasts to star signs and horoscopes. Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 9. Where to Have Sex | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Omar! He works in the hotel industry and told me some crazy stories from his job. I also try to find out why America doesn't have love hotels -- where do Americans have sex? Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 8. Pussy Alarm | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Ananya! We talk about dating Japanese guys and American guys, and the different styles of kissing and sex. Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 7. DTF is Din Tai Fung? | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Tomo! We talk about our favorite foods, including our favorite Taiwanese restaurant. And she gives me advice on how to make friends in a new country! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 6. Alcohol, Sex and Tokyo | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Reyna! She lives in Sumida but is from Seattle, and she told me all about her "experiences" in both places. Maybe I need to go to Sumida River for my next date. Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 5. Custom Naomi Burger | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Yurie. We talk about our experiences with restaurants in New York and what it's like working in food service. I miss getting to customize my order! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 4. Twinning | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Milena! She's a twin and we talk about what it's like to be a twin in America. Ah, I wish I had a twin! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 3. Dun Ta Ta GASOLINA! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Sophia! She is an American dancer living in Japan and we talk about dance in America vs. Japan, as well as the different cultures we experienced moving to each other's countries. Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 2. So Cool ESports | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Alexander! He works in Esports and he taught me a lot about gaming competitions. Maybe I'll get into it and start competing in my favorite retro games! Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you! Transcript

item.title: S2 1. Poop or Boob? | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome to season 2 of my podcast! I'm so excited to keep learning about American culture, even while I'm in Japan for the next 6 months. Today's guest is McK - we talk about her culture shock moving to Japan and my embarrassing poop story... or is it boob story? Do you want to be on the show? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you!

item.title: S1 24. Field Trip to Brooklyn's Japan Village! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description For today's episode, we left the studio and went out into the real world! We took a field trip to Japan Village and talked to New Yorkers shopping for Japanese food. I always wondered what Americans thought of Japanese food, and today I got to find out! Thanks so much to Japan Village and Sunrise Mart - if you live in New York, you should definitely go! Do you have an interesting job?

item.title: S1 23. NY Psychic: Will I Marry Brad Pitt? | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today, we have a special episode with Helen, a psychic reader! She did tarot card readings for us and told me about my future - this podcast, my love life and whether I'll be marrying Brad or Leo. Thank you, Helen! Check her out on Instagram @helenshirley or at www.heleninqueens.com for your own reading. Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show!

item.title: S1 22. 1, 2, 3... Wet Pussy! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Aki! We talk about podcasts, karaoke, and gay culture in New York vs. in Japan. I love Japanese culture and I want to bring more of it to America! Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 21. My Language Father | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Steve! He can speak 20 languages!! We talk about the best ways to learn new languages, how to get the sexy talk going and how the most important thing is to connect with people. Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 20. New York Stoopin’ | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today, Joey taught me how to get FREE furniture in New York! We also talk about creativity, fashion, and young New York culture. Shall we go stooping? Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 19. Boob Twirl Tassels | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Tina. We met once before almost a decade ago! We talk about pinup dresses. burlesque shows, cute pasties... Now I want to learn how to twirl tassels with my boobs! Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 18. J-Pop, Go Go! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today I talk to Jillian, an American who studied underground Japanese music! She knows a lot more about Japanese music than me and we talk about some of our favorite songs and artists. Let's dive into the world of Japanese music! Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 17. Celebrity Encounter: Fighting Over Armrest Space With… | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Nami! We talk about celebrity culture in America vs Japan. Also, Brad Pitt, if you're listening... I have a special message just for you. Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 16. Always Wet Naomi? | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Kitty! We talk about drag performance and come up with some fun names for my drag persona. What would be your drag name? Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 15. Get Strong! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Khalil Rountree. He is a UFC fighter, and friends with my friends in New York! He talks to me about his inspiring experiences, and his favorite Thai food spot in the city! Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 14. HELLA FILTHY! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today, Antonio taught me about Seattle and two new slang words! We also talked about how we get our creative juices flowing and had a hella good time! Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 13. What Makes Us Naomi | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Naomi who is multi cultural like me, lives in Israel and speaks five languages! I learned about Israeli comedy and made me think passionately about my identity as well. Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 12. Spicy Words w/ Mr. Sexy Voice | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Henry! He is from Malaysia and Australia and lives in New York. We talk about a lot but I was pretty distracted by his sexy voice and accent! Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 11. Let’s Party w/ Some Orgasm Corn! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Kelly. She taught me about American parties! Who’s taking me to prom? Also, I’m having difficulty pronouncing / remembering some words… was it organic or orgasm corns I wanted? Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 10. Yasss Queen...Grabbin' Life by the Balls | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Justin! We talk about fashion and the different styles in Atlanta. Yasss queen… I can’t wait to go to ATL! Do you have advice for me? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 9. Fried Alligators with Florida Man? | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today, I learned all about Florida from Chandler - including the best ways to eat alligator! Also, apparently Florida people are crazy?! But I like crazy, so maybe I should go visit. Do you have an interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 8. Hugs and Finger Snappin' | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Linda! She used to live in - Gunma (the countryside in Japan)?! So she knows deep Japanese culture and she taught me about differences she's noticed between Japanese culture and Black American culture. I love her! *finger snap* Do you have advice for me? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 7. Pussy Cats and Sex Words | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Hannah. I learned so much! We start with a nice conversation about the South, then things get juicier as she teaches me some sexy slang, including my favorite new word... it starts with a p and it doesn't mean cat! Do you have a cool or interesting job? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 6. Your Dream... GO GO GO! | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today Ella taught me all about Chicago, deep dish pizza, and gave me the courage to try to stand up in America. I also get a little deep about what comedy means to me... Also - are you a TikToker? I want to know more about American teen culture, so if you can teach me about it, come join me on the show! Fill out the form and tell me why you love TikTok.

item.title: S1 5. Strong Burgers and Muscle Guys | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today's guest is Stella. She's an Italian who lived in the States and she gave me advice on how to meet American muscular men at the gym. She's also supposed to introduce me to her hot friends from her online Zoom classes... By the way, are you a psychic reader? If you are, I'd love to have you on the show -- Fill out this form and tell me when I'll be famous in America!

item.title: S1 4. Everything is Bigger in Texas | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Howdy, y'all! Today's guests are Giovani and Sayaka. They are a very cute couple that taught me all about Texas, my dream state! I can't wait to go and see how BIG everything is. Also, they had a surprise for me at the end...I'm so happy! Do you have advice for me? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! Transcript

item.title: S1 3. Butter Fry? / MAGNUM | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today I talked to two guests. Casey opened up the world of fried food to me - fried oreos, fried mac 'n' cheese... wait, fried BUTTER? Then fellow Japanese, Shizuka inspired me to try to find love in America - but will I be able to find it on Tinder? Do you have advice for me? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show!

item.title: S1 2. Netflix and... Chill? | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Today’s guest is Karen. We talk about… using Tinder and my New York dating experience! My date told me we can watch Netflix and chill...?! You'll have to listen for the juicy details. Do you have advice for me? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show! https://naomitakesamerica.com/ Transcript

item.title: S1 1. Rappers vs. Lovers | Naomi Takes America
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome to my podcast! This is my first episode and I’m so excited. Today I got to talk to Emily from Philly. She is an American fan who found me when she visited Japan. We talk about American food and something called cheese steak? I don’t know, but all I want now is that Philly cheesesteak jawn! Do you have advice for me? Fill out this form and maybe I’ll get to talk to you on the show!
